<h3 id="X38179">X(38179) = CENTROID OF TRIANGLE {X(5), X(9), X(10)}</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; 2*a^6-(b+c)*a^5-2*(4*b^2+3*b*c+4*c^2)*a^4+4*(b+c)*(2*b^2+b*c+2*c^2)*a^3+2*(b+2*c)*(2*b+c)*(b-c)^2*a^2-(b^2-c^2)*(b-c)*(7*b^2+10*b*c+7*c^2)*a+2*(b^2-c^2)^2*(b-c)^2  :  :

<br>
<b>X(38179) = X(9)+2*X(9956) = X(355)+5*X(18230) = X(1385)-4*X(6666) = 5*X(1656)+X(5223) = 5*X(1698)+X(5779) = 4*X(3628)-X(5542) = 4*X(3634)-X(31657) = 3*X(5055)-X(38036) = 7*X(7989)-X(31671) = 3*X(10175)-X(38151) = X(38037)+3*X(38057) = X(38037)-3*X(38108) = 3*X(38042)-X(38170) = X(38043)-3*X(38082) = 3*X(38057)-X(38126) = 3*X(38082)+X(38175) = 3*X(38083)-X(38172) = 3*X(38101)-X(38130) = 3*X(38101)+X(38158) = 3*X(38108)+X(38126)</b>
<p>X(38179) lies on these lines: {2,38030}, {9,9956}, {30,38101}, {210,11218}, {355,18230}, {515,38113}, {516,3845}, {517,38037}, {518,11230}, {519,38043}, {527,38083}, {758,38181}, {952,38059}, {971,11231}, {1385,6666}, {1656,5223}, {1698,5779}, {2802,38180}, {3085,15008}, {3564,38194}, {3628,5542}, {3634,31657}, {5055,38036}, {5445,31391}, {5686,5886}, {5762,10175}, {5817,26446}, {5843,38204}, {5844,38210}, {5847,38166}, {5850,10172}, {5853,38176}, {5856,38182}, {5857,38183}, {7989,31671}, {8232,31794}, {10398,31479}, {11495,31447}, {15699,38041}, {18480,31658}, {19855,31821}, {19875,38121}, {19877,36996}, {21153,28160}, {24393,24680}, {28198,38075}, {28204,38031}, {28208,38067}, {30329,31835}, {31663,31672}</p>
<p>
X(38179) = midpoint of X(i) and X(j) for these {i,j}: {5686, 5886}, {5817, 26446}, {38031, 38154}, {38037, 38126}, {38043, 38175}, {38057, 38108}, {38130, 38158}<br>
X(38179) = reflection of X(38171) in X(10172)<br>
X(38179) = complement of X(38030)<br>
X(38179) = {X(i),X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (38037, 38057, 38126), (38082, 38175, 38043), (38101, 38158, 38130), (38108, 38126, 38037), (38216, 38217, 38059)<br>
</p>
